players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today to win."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Diana, vote with me to end this."
You: "I have nothing to hide and I did not kill Alice. Let's focus on finding the real killer instead of making false accusations."
Diana: "I believe in justice and fairness. Let us focus on finding the real killer instead of making false accusations. We should gather more information before making any hasty decisions."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
